Unlimited On Net local/STD mobile calls -- 3000 National Minutes -- 1 GB 3G/4G Data -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable.  Daily/weekly CUP of 300/1200Mins will be applicable on On-Net + Off-Net min. UL On-Net will be higher priority in charging followed by 3000mins in L+N bucket. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
